questions.question: OSI model mein kitni layers hoti hain?
questions.explanation: OSI model mein 7 layers hoti hain: Physical, Data Link, Network, Transport, Session, Presentation, Application.

questions.question: Kaunsi layer routing handle karti hai?
questions.explanation: Network layer (Layer 3) routing, IP addressing, aur path determination handle karti hai.

questions.question: TCP kis layer par operate karta hai?
questions.explanation: TCP (Transmission Control Protocol) Transport layer (Layer 4) par operate karta hai.

questions.question: MAC address kya identify karta hai?
questions.explanation: MAC address ek hardware address hai jo network interface card (NIC) ko uniquely identify karta hai.

questions.question: Kaunsa protocol connectionless hai?
questions.explanation: UDP (User Datagram Protocol) connectionless hai - data transfer se pehle koi handshaking nahi hoti.

questions.question: HTTP by default kaunsa port use karta hai?
questions.explanation: HTTP by default port 80 use karta hai. HTTPS port 443 use karta hai.
